Text.Page:
Once peace is restored, one of those brave youngsters—Kurio, perhaps—will become the great chief of the orcans, and wear a crown made from the skull of a {@LinkCreature:41#4002#giant warmaster}. Ours was destroyed when we went into exile.

Our new chief would be proud to wear a crown you had hunted. Will you honor us by killing one of these beasts and taking its head?
Well done. Now I will fashion the crown and wait for peace to come.
Have you brought the skull? When I have it I will create a crown fit for a great chief.
